            SELECT t.Id, t.AssignmentId, t.CreatedAt, t.CreatedBy, t.DeletedAt, t.IsActive, t.LastModifiedAt, t.LastModifiedBy, t.OverallComment, t.OverallScore, t.Recommendation, t.Status, t.SubmittedAt, t.TimeSpentMinutes, t0.Id, t0.Comment, t0.CreatedAt, t0.CreatedBy, t0.CriteriaId, t0.DeletedAt, t0.IsActive, t0.LastModifiedAt, t0.LastModifiedBy, t0.ReviewId, t0.Score, t0.Id0, t0.CreatedAt0, t0.CreatedBy0, t0.DeletedAt0, t0.Description, t0.IsActive0, t0.LastModifiedAt0, t0.LastModifiedBy0, t0.MaxScore, t0.Name, t0.SemesterId, t0.Weight
            FROM 
            (
                SELECT TOP(1) r.Id, r.AssignmentId, r.CreatedAt, r.CreatedBy, r.DeletedAt, r.IsActive, r.LastModifiedAt, r.LastModifiedBy, r.OverallComment, r.OverallScore, r.Recommendation, r.Status, r.SubmittedAt, r.TimeSpentMinutes
                FROM reviews AS r
                WHERE (r.Id == @__id_0) && r.IsActive
            ) AS t
            LEFT JOIN 
            (
                SELECT r0.Id, r0.Comment, r0.CreatedAt, r0.CreatedBy, r0.CriteriaId, r0.DeletedAt, r0.IsActive, r0.LastModifiedAt, r0.LastModifiedBy, r0.ReviewId, r0.Score, e.Id AS Id0, e.CreatedAt AS CreatedAt0, e.CreatedBy AS CreatedBy0, e.DeletedAt AS DeletedAt0, e.Description, e.IsActive AS IsActive0, e.LastModifiedAt AS LastModifiedAt0, e.LastModifiedBy AS LastModifiedBy0, e.MaxScore, e.Name, e.SemesterId, e.Weight
                FROM review_criteria_scores AS r0
                INNER JOIN evaluation_criteria AS e ON r0.CriteriaId == e.Id
            ) AS t0 ON t.Id == t0.ReviewId
            ORDER BY t.Id ASC, t0.Id ASC), 
        null, 
        Func<QueryContext, DbDataReader, ResultContext, SingleQueryResultCoordinator, Review>, 
        App.DAL.Context.MyDbContext, 
        False, 
        False, 
        True
    ), 
    cancellationToken: queryContext.CancellationToken)'

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[AssignmentId], [t].[CreatedAt], [t].[CreatedBy], [t].[DeletedAt], [t].[IsActive], [t].[LastModifiedAt], [t].[LastModifiedBy], [t].[OverallComment], [t].[OverallScore], [t].[Recommendation], [t].[Status], [t].[SubmittedAt], [t].[TimeSpentMinutes], [t0].[Id], [t0].[Comment], [t0].[CreatedAt], [t0].[CreatedBy], [t0].[CriteriaId], [t0].[DeletedAt], [t0].[IsActive], [t0].[LastModifiedAt], [t0].[LastModifiedBy], [t0].[ReviewId], [t0].[Score], [t0].[Id0], [t0].[CreatedAt0], [t0].[CreatedBy0], [t0].[DeletedAt0], [t0].[Description], [t0].[IsActive0], [t0].[LastModifiedAt0], [t0].[LastModifiedBy0], [t0].[MaxScore], [t0].[Name], [t0].[SemesterId], [t0].[Weight]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [r].[Id], [r].[AssignmentId], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[CreatedBy], [r].[DeletedAt], [r].[IsActive], [r].[LastModifiedAt], [r].[LastModifiedBy], [r].[OverallComment], [r].[OverallScore], [r].[Recommendation], [r].[Status], [r].[SubmittedAt], [r].[TimeSpentMinutes]
    FROM [reviews] AS [r]
    WHERE [r].[Id] = @__id_0 AND [r].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [r0].[Id], [r0].[Comment], [r0].[CreatedAt], [r0].[CreatedBy], [r0].[CriteriaId], [r0].[DeletedAt], [r0].[IsActive], [r0].[LastModifiedAt], [r0].[LastModifiedBy], [r0].[ReviewId], [r0].[Score], [e].[Id] AS [Id0], [e].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [e].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy0], [e].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [e].[Description], [e].[IsActive] AS [IsActive0], [e].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [e].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [e].[MaxScore], [e].[Name], [e].[SemesterId], [e].[Weight]
    FROM [review_criteria_scores] AS [r0]
    INNER JOIN [evaluation_criteria] AS [e] ON [r0].[CriteriaId] = [e].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[ReviewId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[AssignmentId], [t].[CreatedAt], [t].[CreatedBy], [t].[DeletedAt], [t].[IsActive], [t].[LastModifiedAt], [t].[LastModifiedBy], [t].[OverallComment], [t].[OverallScore], [t].[Recommendation], [t].[Status], [t].[SubmittedAt], [t].[TimeSpentMinutes], [t0].[Id], [t0].[Comment], [t0].[CreatedAt], [t0].[CreatedBy], [t0].[CriteriaId], [t0].[DeletedAt], [t0].[IsActive], [t0].[LastModifiedAt], [t0].[LastModifiedBy], [t0].[ReviewId], [t0].[Score], [t0].[Id0], [t0].[CreatedAt0], [t0].[CreatedBy0], [t0].[DeletedAt0], [t0].[Description], [t0].[IsActive0], [t0].[LastModifiedAt0], [t0].[LastModifiedBy0], [t0].[MaxScore], [t0].[Name], [t0].[SemesterId], [t0].[Weight]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [r].[Id], [r].[AssignmentId], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[CreatedBy], [r].[DeletedAt], [r].[IsActive], [r].[LastModifiedAt], [r].[LastModifiedBy], [r].[OverallComment], [r].[OverallScore], [r].[Recommendation], [r].[Status], [r].[SubmittedAt], [r].[TimeSpentMinutes]
    FROM [reviews] AS [r]
    WHERE [r].[Id] = @__id_0 AND [r].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [r0].[Id], [r0].[Comment], [r0].[CreatedAt], [r0].[CreatedBy], [r0].[CriteriaId], [r0].[DeletedAt], [r0].[IsActive], [r0].[LastModifiedAt], [r0].[LastModifiedBy], [r0].[ReviewId], [r0].[Score], [e].[Id] AS [Id0], [e].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [e].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy0], [e].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [e].[Description], [e].[IsActive] AS [IsActive0], [e].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [e].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [e].[MaxScore], [e].[Name], [e].[SemesterId], [e].[Weight]

    INNER JOIN [evaluation_criteria] AS [e] ON [r0].[CriteriaId] = [e].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[ReviewId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [r].[Id], [r].[AssignmentId], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[CreatedBy], [r].[DeletedAt], [r].[IsActive], [r].[LastModifiedAt], [r].[LastModifiedBy], [r].[OverallComment], [r].[OverallScore], [r].[Recommendation], [r].[Status], [r].[SubmittedAt], [r].[TimeSpentMinutes]
    FROM [reviews] AS [r]
    WHERE [r].[Id] = @__id_0 AND [r].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [r0].[Id], [r0].[Comment], [r0].[CreatedAt], [r0].[CreatedBy], [r0].[CriteriaId], [r0].[DeletedAt], [r0].[IsActive], [r0].[LastModifiedAt], [r0].[LastModifiedBy], [r0].[ReviewId], [r0].[Score], [e].[Id] AS [Id0], [e].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [e].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy0], [e].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [e].[Description], [e].[IsActive] AS [IsActive0], [e].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [e].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [e].[MaxScore], [e].[Name], [e].[SemesterId], [e].[Weight]
    FROM [review_criteria_scores] AS [r0]
    INNER JOIN [evaluation_criteria] AS [e] ON [r0].[CriteriaId] = [e].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[ReviewId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

            SELECT r.Id, r.AssignmentId, r.CreatedAt, r.CreatedBy, r.DeletedAt, r.IsActive, r.LastModifiedAt, r.LastModifiedBy, r.OverallComment, r.OverallScore, r.Recommendation, r.Status, r.SubmittedAt, r.TimeSpentMinutes

        (

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[AssignmentId], [t].[CreatedAt], [t].[CreatedBy], [t].[DeletedAt], [t].[IsActive], [t].[LastModifiedAt], [t].[LastModifiedBy], [t].[OverallComment], [t].[OverallScore], [t].[Recommendation], [t].[Status], [t].[SubmittedAt], [t].[TimeSpentMinutes], [t0].[Id], [t0].[Comment], [t0].[CreatedAt], [t0].[CreatedBy], [t0].[CriteriaId], [t0].[DeletedAt], [t0].[IsActive], [t0].[LastModifiedAt], [t0].[LastModifiedBy], [t0].[ReviewId], [t0].[Score], [t0].[Id0], [t0].[CreatedAt0], [t0].[CreatedBy0], [t0].[DeletedAt0], [t0].[Description], [t0].[IsActive0], [t0].[LastModifiedAt0], [t0].[LastModifiedBy0], [t0].[MaxScore], [t0].[Name], [t0].[SemesterId], [t0].[Weight]
FROM (
    SELECT [r].[Id], [r].[AssignmentId], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[CreatedBy], [r].[DeletedAt], [r].[IsActive], [r].[LastModifiedAt], [r].[LastModifiedBy], [r].[OverallComment], [r].[OverallScore], [r].[Recommendation], [r].[Status], [r].[SubmittedAt], [r].[TimeSpentMinutes]
    FROM [reviews] AS [r]
    WHERE [r].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit)
    ORDER BY [r].[CreatedAt] DESC
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [r0].[Id], [r0].[Comment], [r0].[CreatedAt], [r0].[CreatedBy], [r0].[CriteriaId], [r0].[DeletedAt], [r0].[IsActive], [r0].[LastModifiedAt], [r0].[LastModifiedBy], [r0].[ReviewId], [r0].[Score], [e].[Id] AS [Id0], [e].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [e].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy0], [e].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [e].[Description], [e].[IsActive] AS [IsActive0], [e].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [e].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [e].[MaxScore], [e].[Name], [e].[SemesterId], [e].[Weight]
    FROM [review_criteria_scores] AS [r0]
    INNER JOIN [evaluation_criteria] AS [e] ON [r0].[CriteriaId] = [e].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[ReviewId]
ORDER BY [t].[CreatedAt] DESC, [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [r0].[Id], [r0].[Comment], [r0].[CreatedAt], [r0].[CreatedBy], [r0].[CriteriaId], [r0].[DeletedAt], [r0].[IsActive], [r0].[LastModifiedAt], [r0].[LastModifiedBy], [r0].[ReviewId], [r0].[Score], [e].[Id] AS [Id0], [e].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [e].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy0], [e].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [e].[Description], [e].[IsActive] AS [IsActive0], [e].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [e].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [e].[MaxScore], [e].[Name], [e].[SemesterId], [e].[Weight]
    FROM [review_criteria_scores] AS [r0]
    INNER JOIN [evaluation_criteria] AS [e] ON [r0].[CriteriaId] = [e].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [r].[Id] = [t].[ReviewId]
WHERE [r].[AssignmentId] = @__assignmentId_0 AND [r].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit)
ORDER BY [r].[CreatedAt] DESC, [r].[Id], [t].[Id]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[AssignmentId], [t].[CreatedAt], [t].[CreatedBy], [t].[DeletedAt], [t].[IsActive], [t].[LastModifiedAt], [t].[LastModifiedBy], [t].[OverallComment], [t].[OverallScore], [t].[Recommendation], [t].[Status], [t].[SubmittedAt], [t].[TimeSpentMinutes], [t0].[Id], [t0].[Comment], [t0].[CreatedAt], [t0].[CreatedBy], [t0].[CriteriaId], [t0].[DeletedAt], [t0].[IsActive], [t0].[LastModifiedAt], [t0].[LastModifiedBy], [t0].[ReviewId], [t0].[Score], [t0].[Id0], [t0].[CreatedAt0], [t0].[CreatedBy0], [t0].[DeletedAt0], [t0].[Description], [t0].[IsActive0], [t0].[LastModifiedAt0], [t0].[LastModifiedBy0], [t0].[MaxScore], [t0].[Name], [t0].[SemesterId], [t0].[Weight]
FROM (
    SELECT [r].[Id], [r].[AssignmentId], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[CreatedBy], [r].[DeletedAt], [r].[IsActive], [r].[LastModifiedAt], [r].[LastModifiedBy], [r].[OverallComment], [r].[OverallScore], [r].[Recommendation], [r].[Status], [r].[SubmittedAt], [r].[TimeSpentMinutes]
    FROM [reviews] AS [r]
    WHERE [r].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit)
    ORDER BY [r].[CreatedAt] DESC
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [r0].[Id], [r0].[Comment], [r0].[CreatedAt], [r0].[CreatedBy], [r0].[CriteriaId], [r0].[DeletedAt], [r0].[IsActive], [r0].[LastModifiedAt], [r0].[LastModifiedBy], [r0].[ReviewId], [r0].[Score], [e].[Id] AS [Id0], [e].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [e].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy0], [e].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [e].[Description], [e].[IsActive] AS [IsActive0], [e].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [e].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [e].[MaxScore], [e].[Name], [e].[SemesterId], [e].[Weight]
    FROM [review_criteria_scores] AS [r0]
    INNER JOIN [evaluation_criteria] AS [e] ON [r0].[CriteriaId] = [e].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[ReviewId]
ORDER BY [t].[CreatedAt] DESC, [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [r].[Id], [r].[AssignmentId], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[CreatedBy], [r].[DeletedAt], [r].[IsActive], [r].[LastModifiedAt], [r].[LastModifiedBy], [r].[OverallComment], [r].[OverallScore], [r].[Recommendation], [r].[Status], [r].[SubmittedAt], [r].[TimeSpentMinutes]
    FROM [reviews] AS [r]
    WHERE [r].[Id] = @__id_0 AND [r].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [r0].[Id], [r0].[Comment], [r0].[CreatedAt], [r0].[CreatedBy], [r0].[CriteriaId], [r0].[DeletedAt], [r0].[IsActive], [r0].[LastModifiedAt], [r0].[LastModifiedBy], [r0].[ReviewId], [r0].[Score], [e].[Id] AS [Id0], [e].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [e].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy0], [e].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [e].[Description], [e].[IsActive] AS [IsActive0], [e].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [e].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [e].[MaxScore], [e].[Name], [e].[SemesterId], [e].[Weight]
    FROM [review_criteria_scores] AS [r0]
    INNER JOIN [evaluation_criteria] AS [e] ON [r0].[CriteriaId] = [e].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[ReviewId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

    SELECT TOP(1) [r].[Id], [r].[AssignmentId], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[CreatedBy], [r].[DeletedAt], [r].[IsActive], [r].[LastModifiedAt], [r].[LastModifiedBy], [r].[OverallComment], [r].[OverallScore], [r].[Recommendation], [r].[Status], [r].[SubmittedAt], [r].[TimeSpentMinutes]
    FROM [reviews] AS [r]
    WHERE [r].[Id] = @__id_0 AND [r].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [r0].[Id], [r0].[Comment], [r0].[CreatedAt], [r0].[CreatedBy], [r0].[CriteriaId], [r0].[DeletedAt], [r0].[IsActive], [r0].[LastModifiedAt], [r0].[LastModifiedBy], [r0].[ReviewId], [r0].[Score], [e].[Id] AS [Id0], [e].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [e].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy0], [e].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [e].[Description], [e].[IsActive] AS [IsActive0], [e].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [e].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [e].[MaxScore], [e].[Name], [e].[SemesterId], [e].[Weight]
    FROM [review_criteria_scores] AS [r0]
    INNER JOIN [evaluation_criteria] AS [e] ON [r0].[CriteriaId] = [e].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[ReviewId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

FROM (
    SELECT [r].[Id], [r].[AssignmentId], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[CreatedBy], [r].[DeletedAt], [r].[IsActive], [r].[LastModifiedAt], [r].[LastModifiedBy], [r].[OverallComment], [r].[OverallScore], [r].[Recommendation], [r].[Status], [r].[SubmittedAt], [r].[TimeSpentMinutes]
    FROM [reviews] AS [r]
    WHERE [r].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit)
    ORDER BY [r].[CreatedAt] DESC
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [r0].[Id], [r0].[Comment], [r0].[CreatedAt], [r0].[CreatedBy], [r0].[CriteriaId], [r0].[DeletedAt], [r0].[IsActive], [r0].[LastModifiedAt], [r0].[LastModifiedBy], [r0].[ReviewId], [r0].[Score], [e].[Id] AS [Id0], [e].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [e].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy0], [e].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [e].[Description], [e].[IsActive] AS [IsActive0], [e].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [e].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [e].[MaxScore], [e].[Name], [e].[SemesterId], [e].[Weight]

) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[ReviewId]
ORDER BY [t].[CreatedAt] DESC, [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

    SELECT TOP(1) [r].[Id], [r].[AssignmentId], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[CreatedBy], [r].[DeletedAt], [r].[IsActive], [r].[LastModifiedAt], [r].[LastModifiedBy], [r].[OverallComment], [r].[OverallScore], [r].[Recommendation], [r].[Status], [r].[SubmittedAt], [r].[TimeSpentMinutes]
    FROM [reviews] AS [r]
    WHERE [r].[Id] = @__id_0 AND [r].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [r0].[Id], [r0].[Comment], [r0].[CreatedAt], [r0].[CreatedBy], [r0].[CriteriaId], [r0].[DeletedAt], [r0].[IsActive], [r0].[LastModifiedAt], [r0].[LastModifiedBy], [r0].[ReviewId], [r0].[Score], [e].[Id] AS [Id0], [e].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [e].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy0], [e].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [e].[Description], [e].[IsActive] AS [IsActive0], [e].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [e].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [e].[MaxScore], [e].[Name], [e].[SemesterId], [e].[Weight]

) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[ReviewId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[AssignmentId], [t].[CreatedAt], [t].[CreatedBy], [t].[DeletedAt], [t].[IsActive], [t].[LastModifiedAt], [t].[LastModifiedBy], [t].[OverallComment], [t].[OverallScore], [t].[Recommendation], [t].[Status], [t].[SubmittedAt], [t].[TimeSpentMinutes], [t0].[Id], [t0].[Comment], [t0].[CreatedAt], [t0].[CreatedBy], [t0].[CriteriaId], [t0].[DeletedAt], [t0].[IsActive], [t0].[LastModifiedAt], [t0].[LastModifiedBy], [t0].[ReviewId], [t0].[Score], [t0].[Id0], [t0].[CreatedAt0], [t0].[CreatedBy0], [t0].[DeletedAt0], [t0].[Description], [t0].[IsActive0], [t0].[LastModifiedAt0], [t0].[LastModifiedBy0], [t0].[MaxScore], [t0].[Name], [t0].[SemesterId], [t0].[Weight]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [r].[Id], [r].[AssignmentId], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[CreatedBy], [r].[DeletedAt], [r].[IsActive], [r].[LastModifiedAt], [r].[LastModifiedBy], [r].[OverallComment], [r].[OverallScore], [r].[Recommendation], [r].[Status], [r].[SubmittedAt], [r].[TimeSpentMinutes]
    FROM [reviews] AS [r]
    WHERE [r].[Id] = @__id_0 AND [r].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [r0].[Id], [r0].[Comment], [r0].[CreatedAt], [r0].[CreatedBy], [r0].[CriteriaId], [r0].[DeletedAt], [r0].[IsActive], [r0].[LastModifiedAt], [r0].[LastModifiedBy], [r0].[ReviewId], [r0].[Score], [e].[Id] AS [Id0], [e].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [e].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy0], [e].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [e].[Description], [e].[IsActive] AS [IsActive0], [e].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [e].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [e].[MaxScore], [e].[Name], [e].[SemesterId], [e].[Weight]

    INNER JOIN [evaluation_criteria] AS [e] ON [r0].[CriteriaId] = [e].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[ReviewId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[AssignmentId], [t].[CreatedAt], [t].[CreatedBy], [t].[DeletedAt], [t].[IsActive], [t].[LastModifiedAt], [t].[LastModifiedBy], [t].[OverallComment], [t].[OverallScore], [t].[Recommendation], [t].[Status], [t].[SubmittedAt], [t].[TimeSpentMinutes], [t0].[Id], [t0].[Comment], [t0].[CreatedAt], [t0].[CreatedBy], [t0].[CriteriaId], [t0].[DeletedAt], [t0].[IsActive], [t0].[LastModifiedAt], [t0].[LastModifiedBy], [t0].[ReviewId], [t0].[Score], [t0].[Id0], [t0].[CreatedAt0], [t0].[CreatedBy0], [t0].[DeletedAt0], [t0].[Description], [t0].[IsActive0], [t0].[LastModifiedAt0], [t0].[LastModifiedBy0], [t0].[MaxScore], [t0].[Name], [t0].[SemesterId], [t0].[Weight]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [r].[Id], [r].[AssignmentId], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[CreatedBy], [r].[DeletedAt], [r].[IsActive], [r].[LastModifiedAt], [r].[LastModifiedBy], [r].[OverallComment], [r].[OverallScore], [r].[Recommendation], [r].[Status], [r].[SubmittedAt], [r].[TimeSpentMinutes]
    FROM [reviews] AS [r]
    WHERE [r].[Id] = @__id_0 AND [r].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [r0].[Id], [r0].[Comment], [r0].[CreatedAt], [r0].[CreatedBy], [r0].[CriteriaId], [r0].[DeletedAt], [r0].[IsActive], [r0].[LastModifiedAt], [r0].[LastModifiedBy], [r0].[ReviewId], [r0].[Score], [e].[Id] AS [Id0], [e].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [e].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy0], [e].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [e].[Description], [e].[IsActive] AS [IsActive0], [e].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [e].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [e].[MaxScore], [e].[Name], [e].[SemesterId], [e].[Weight]
    FROM [review_criteria_scores] AS [r0]
    INNER JOIN [evaluation_criteria] AS [e] ON [r0].[CriteriaId] = [e].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[ReviewId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[AssignmentId], [t].[CreatedAt], [t].[CreatedBy], [t].[DeletedAt], [t].[IsActive], [t].[LastModifiedAt], [t].[LastModifiedBy], [t].[OverallComment], [t].[OverallScore], [t].[Recommendation], [t].[Status], [t].[SubmittedAt], [t].[TimeSpentMinutes], [t0].[Id], [t0].[Comment], [t0].[CreatedAt], [t0].[CreatedBy], [t0].[CriteriaId], [t0].[DeletedAt], [t0].[IsActive], [t0].[LastModifiedAt], [t0].[LastModifiedBy], [t0].[ReviewId], [t0].[Score], [t0].[Id0], [t0].[CreatedAt0], [t0].[CreatedBy0], [t0].[DeletedAt0], [t0].[Description], [t0].[IsActive0], [t0].[LastModifiedAt0], [t0].[LastModifiedBy0], [t0].[MaxScore], [t0].[Name], [t0].[SemesterId], [t0].[Weight]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [r].[Id], [r].[AssignmentId], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[CreatedBy], [r].[DeletedAt], [r].[IsActive], [r].[LastModifiedAt], [r].[LastModifiedBy], [r].[OverallComment], [r].[OverallScore], [r].[Recommendation], [r].[Status], [r].[SubmittedAt], [r].[TimeSpentMinutes]
    FROM [reviews] AS [r]
    WHERE [r].[Id] = @__id_0 AND [r].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit)
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [r0].[Id], [r0].[Comment], [r0].[CreatedAt], [r0].[CreatedBy], [r0].[CriteriaId], [r0].[DeletedAt], [r0].[IsActive], [r0].[LastModifiedAt], [r0].[LastModifiedBy], [r0].[ReviewId], [r0].[Score], [e].[Id] AS [Id0], [e].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [e].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy0], [e].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [e].[Description], [e].[IsActive] AS [IsActive0], [e].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [e].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [e].[MaxScore], [e].[Name], [e].[SemesterId], [e].[Weight]
    FROM [review_criteria_scores] AS [r0]
    INNER JOIN [evaluation_criteria] AS [e] ON [r0].[CriteriaId] = [e].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[ReviewId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

            SELECT t1.Id, t1.AdditionalNotes, t1.AiCheckDetails, t1.AiCheckScore, t1.AiCheckStatus, t1.CreatedAt, t1.CreatedBy, t1.DeletedAt, t1.DocumentUrl, t1.IsActive, t1.LastModifiedAt, t1.LastModifiedBy, t1.PhaseId, t1.Status, t1.SubmissionRound, t1.SubmittedAt, t1.SubmittedBy, t1.TopicId, t1.TopicVersionId, t1.Id0, t1.Content, t1.Context, t1.CreatedAt0, t1.CreatedBy0, t1.DeletedAt0, t1.Description, t1.DocumentUrl0, t1.EN_Title, t1.ExpectedOutcomes, t1.IsActive0, t1.LastModifiedAt0, t1.LastModifiedBy0, t1.Methodology, t1.Objectives, t1.Problem, t1.Requirements, t1.Status0, t1.SubmittedAt0, t1.SubmittedBy0, t1.TopicId0, t1.VN_title, t1.VersionNumber, t1.Id1, t1.Abbreviation, t1.CategoryId, t1.Content0, t1.Context0, t1.CreatedAt1, t1.CreatedBy1, t1.DeletedAt1, t1.Description0, t1.EN_Title0, t1.IsActive1, t1.IsApproved, t1.IsLegacy, t1.LastModifiedAt1, t1.LastModifiedBy1, t1.MaxStudents, t1.Objectives0, t1.Problem0, t1.SemesterId, t1.SupervisorId, t1.VN_title0, t1.Id2, t1.AccessFailedCount, t1.ConcurrencyStamp, t1.CreatedAt2, t1.DeletedAt2, t1.Email, t1.EmailConfirmed, t1.LastModifiedAt2, t1.LastModifiedBy2, t1.LockoutEnabled, t1.LockoutEnd, t1.NormalizedEmail, t1.NormalizedUserName, t1.PasswordHash, t1.PhoneNumber, t1.PhoneNumberConfirmed, t1.SecurityStamp, t1.TwoFactorEnabled, t1.UserName, r.Id, r.AssignedAt, r.AssignedBy, r.AssignmentType, r.CompletedAt, r.Deadline, r.ReviewerId, r.SkillMatchScore, r.StartedAt, r.Status, r.SubmissionId
            FROM 
            (
                SELECT TOP(1) s.Id, s.AdditionalNotes, s.AiCheckDetails, s.AiCheckScore, s.AiCheckStatus, s.CreatedAt, s.CreatedBy, s.DeletedAt, s.DocumentUrl, s.IsActive, s.LastModifiedAt, s.LastModifiedBy, s.PhaseId, s.Status, s.SubmissionRound, s.SubmittedAt, s.SubmittedBy, s.TopicId, s.TopicVersionId, t.Id AS Id0, t.Content, t.Context, t.CreatedAt AS CreatedAt0, t.CreatedBy AS CreatedBy0, t.DeletedAt AS DeletedAt0, t.Description, t.DocumentUrl AS DocumentUrl0, t.EN_Title, t.ExpectedOutcomes, t.IsActive AS IsActive0, t.LastModifiedAt AS LastModifiedAt0, t.LastModifiedBy AS LastModifiedBy0, t.Methodology, t.Objectives, t.Problem, t.Requirements, t.Status AS Status0, t.SubmittedAt AS SubmittedAt0, t.SubmittedBy AS SubmittedBy0, t.TopicId AS TopicId0, t.VN_title, t.VersionNumber, t0.Id AS Id1, t0.Abbreviation, t0.CategoryId, t0.Content AS Content0, t0.Context AS Context0, t0.CreatedAt AS CreatedAt1, t0.CreatedBy AS CreatedBy1, t0.DeletedAt AS DeletedAt1, t0.Description AS Description0, t0.EN_Title AS EN_Title0, t0.IsActive AS IsActive1, t0.IsApproved, t0.IsLegacy, t0.LastModifiedAt AS LastModifiedAt1, t0.LastModifiedBy AS LastModifiedBy1, t0.MaxStudents, t0.Objectives AS Objectives0, t0.Problem AS Problem0, t0.SemesterId, t0.SupervisorId, t0.VN_title AS VN_title0, u.Id AS Id2, u.AccessFailedCount, u.ConcurrencyStamp, u.CreatedAt AS CreatedAt2, u.DeletedAt AS DeletedAt2, u.Email, u.EmailConfirmed, u.LastModifiedAt AS LastModifiedAt2, u.LastModifiedBy AS LastModifiedBy2, u.LockoutEnabled, u.LockoutEnd, u.NormalizedEmail, u.NormalizedUserName, u.PasswordHash, u.PhoneNumber, u.PhoneNumberConfirmed, u.SecurityStamp, u.TwoFactorEnabled, u.UserName
                FROM submissions AS s
                LEFT JOIN topic_versions AS t ON s.TopicVersionId == t.Id
                LEFT JOIN topics AS t0 ON t.TopicId == t0.Id
                INNER JOIN users AS u ON s.SubmittedBy == u.Id
                WHERE s.Id == @__submissionId_0
            ) AS t1
            LEFT JOIN reviewer_assignments AS r ON t1.Id == r.SubmissionId
            ORDER BY t1.Id ASC, t1.Id0 ASC, t1.Id1 ASC, t1.Id2 ASC), 
        null, 
        Func<QueryContext, DbDataReader, ResultContext, SingleQueryResultCoordinator, Submission>, 
        App.DAL.Context.MyDbContext, 
        False, 
        False, 
        True
    ), 
    cancellationToken: queryContext.CancellationToken)'

FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [s].[Id], [s].[AdditionalNotes], [s].[AiCheckDetails], [s].[AiCheckScore], [s].[AiCheckStatus], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[CreatedBy], [s].[DeletedAt], [s].[DocumentUrl], [s].[IsActive], [s].[LastModifiedAt], [s].[LastModifiedBy], [s].[PhaseId], [s].[Status], [s].[SubmissionRound], [s].[SubmittedAt], [s].[SubmittedBy], [s].[TopicId], [s].[TopicVersionId], [t].[Id] AS [Id0], [t].[Content], [t].[Context], [t].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [t].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy0], [t].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [t].[Description], [t].[DocumentUrl] AS [DocumentUrl0], [t].[EN_Title], [t].[ExpectedOutcomes], [t].[IsActive] AS [IsActive0], [t].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [t].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [t].[Methodology], [t].[Objectives], [t].[Problem], [t].[Requirements], [t].[Status] AS [Status0], [t].[SubmittedAt] AS [SubmittedAt0], [t].[SubmittedBy] AS [SubmittedBy0], [t].[TopicId] AS [TopicId0], [t].[VN_title], [t].[VersionNumber], [t0].[Id] AS [Id1], [t0].[Abbreviation], [t0].[CategoryId], [t0].[Content] AS [Content0], [t0].[Context] AS [Context0], [t0].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt1], [t0].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy1], [t0].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt1], [t0].[Description] AS [Description0], [t0].[EN_Title] AS [EN_Title0], [t0].[IsActive] AS [IsActive1], [t0].[IsApproved], [t0].[IsLegacy], [t0].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt1], [t0].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy1], [t0].[MaxStudents], [t0].[Objectives] AS [Objectives0], [t0].[Problem] AS [Problem0], [t0].[SemesterId], [t0].[SupervisorId], [t0].[VN_title] AS [VN_title0], [u].[Id] AS [Id2], [u].[AccessFailedCount], [u].[ConcurrencyStamp], [u].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt2], [u].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt2], [u].[Email], [u].[EmailConfirmed], [u].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt2], [u].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy2], [u].[LockoutEnabled], [u].[LockoutEnd], [u].[NormalizedEmail], [u].[NormalizedUserName], [u].[PasswordHash], [u].[PhoneNumber], [u].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [u].[SecurityStamp], [u].[TwoFactorEnabled], [u].[UserName]
    FROM [submissions] AS [s]
    LEFT JOIN [topic_versions] AS [t] ON [s].[TopicVersionId] = [t].[Id]
    LEFT JOIN [topics] AS [t0] ON [t].[TopicId] = [t0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [users] AS [u] ON [s].[SubmittedBy] = [u].[Id]
    WHERE [s].[Id] = @__submissionId_0
) AS [t1]
LEFT JOIN [reviewer_assignments] AS [r] ON [t1].[Id] = [r].[SubmissionId]
ORDER BY [t1].[Id], [t1].[Id0], [t1].[Id1], [t1].[Id2]

FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [s].[Id], [s].[AdditionalNotes], [s].[AiCheckDetails], [s].[AiCheckScore], [s].[AiCheckStatus], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[CreatedBy], [s].[DeletedAt], [s].[DocumentUrl], [s].[IsActive], [s].[LastModifiedAt], [s].[LastModifiedBy], [s].[PhaseId], [s].[Status], [s].[SubmissionRound], [s].[SubmittedAt], [s].[SubmittedBy], [s].[TopicId], [s].[TopicVersionId], [t].[Id] AS [Id0], [t].[Content], [t].[Context], [t].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [t].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy0], [t].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [t].[Description], [t].[DocumentUrl] AS [DocumentUrl0], [t].[EN_Title], [t].[ExpectedOutcomes], [t].[IsActive] AS [IsActive0], [t].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [t].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [t].[Methodology], [t].[Objectives], [t].[Problem], [t].[Requirements], [t].[Status] AS [Status0], [t].[SubmittedAt] AS [SubmittedAt0], [t].[SubmittedBy] AS [SubmittedBy0], [t].[TopicId] AS [TopicId0], [t].[VN_title], [t].[VersionNumber], [t0].[Id] AS [Id1], [t0].[Abbreviation], [t0].[CategoryId], [t0].[Content] AS [Content0], [t0].[Context] AS [Context0], [t0].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt1], [t0].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy1], [t0].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt1], [t0].[Description] AS [Description0], [t0].[EN_Title] AS [EN_Title0], [t0].[IsActive] AS [IsActive1], [t0].[IsApproved], [t0].[IsLegacy], [t0].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt1], [t0].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy1], [t0].[MaxStudents], [t0].[Objectives] AS [Objectives0], [t0].[Problem] AS [Problem0], [t0].[SemesterId], [t0].[SupervisorId], [t0].[VN_title] AS [VN_title0], [u].[Id] AS [Id2], [u].[AccessFailedCount], [u].[ConcurrencyStamp], [u].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt2], [u].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt2], [u].[Email], [u].[EmailConfirmed], [u].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt2], [u].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy2], [u].[LockoutEnabled], [u].[LockoutEnd], [u].[NormalizedEmail], [u].[NormalizedUserName], [u].[PasswordHash], [u].[PhoneNumber], [u].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [u].[SecurityStamp], [u].[TwoFactorEnabled], [u].[UserName]
    FROM [submissions] AS [s]
    LEFT JOIN [topic_versions] AS [t] ON [s].[TopicVersionId] = [t].[Id]
    LEFT JOIN [topics] AS [t0] ON [t].[TopicId] = [t0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [users] AS [u] ON [s].[SubmittedBy] = [u].[Id]
    WHERE [s].[Id] = @__submissionId_0
) AS [t1]
LEFT JOIN [reviewer_assignments] AS [r] ON [t1].[Id] = [r].[SubmissionId]
ORDER BY [t1].[Id], [t1].[Id0], [t1].[Id1], [t1].[Id2]

INNER JOIN [users] AS [u] ON [r0].[ReviewerId] = [u].[Id]
WHERE [r].[AssignmentId] IN (

    FROM OPENJSON(@__Select_0) WITH ([value] int '$') AS [s]
) AND [r].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit)

FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [s].[Id], [s].[AdditionalNotes], [s].[AiCheckDetails], [s].[AiCheckScore], [s].[AiCheckStatus], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[CreatedBy], [s].[DeletedAt], [s].[DocumentUrl], [s].[IsActive], [s].[LastModifiedAt], [s].[LastModifiedBy], [s].[PhaseId], [s].[Status], [s].[SubmissionRound], [s].[SubmittedAt], [s].[SubmittedBy], [s].[TopicId], [s].[TopicVersionId], [t].[Id] AS [Id0], [t].[Content], [t].[Context], [t].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [t].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy0], [t].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [t].[Description], [t].[DocumentUrl] AS [DocumentUrl0], [t].[EN_Title], [t].[ExpectedOutcomes], [t].[IsActive] AS [IsActive0], [t].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [t].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [t].[Methodology], [t].[Objectives], [t].[Problem], [t].[Requirements], [t].[Status] AS [Status0], [t].[SubmittedAt] AS [SubmittedAt0], [t].[SubmittedBy] AS [SubmittedBy0], [t].[TopicId] AS [TopicId0], [t].[VN_title], [t].[VersionNumber], [t0].[Id] AS [Id1], [t0].[Abbreviation], [t0].[CategoryId], [t0].[Content] AS [Content0], [t0].[Context] AS [Context0], [t0].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt1], [t0].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy1], [t0].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt1], [t0].[Description] AS [Description0], [t0].[EN_Title] AS [EN_Title0], [t0].[IsActive] AS [IsActive1], [t0].[IsApproved], [t0].[IsLegacy], [t0].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt1], [t0].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy1], [t0].[MaxStudents], [t0].[Objectives] AS [Objectives0], [t0].[Problem] AS [Problem0], [t0].[SemesterId], [t0].[SupervisorId], [t0].[VN_title] AS [VN_title0], [u].[Id] AS [Id2], [u].[AccessFailedCount], [u].[ConcurrencyStamp], [u].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt2], [u].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt2], [u].[Email], [u].[EmailConfirmed], [u].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt2], [u].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy2], [u].[LockoutEnabled], [u].[LockoutEnd], [u].[NormalizedEmail], [u].[NormalizedUserName], [u].[PasswordHash], [u].[PhoneNumber], [u].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [u].[SecurityStamp], [u].[TwoFactorEnabled], [u].[UserName]
    FROM [submissions] AS [s]
    LEFT JOIN [topic_versions] AS [t] ON [s].[TopicVersionId] = [t].[Id]
    LEFT JOIN [topics] AS [t0] ON [t].[TopicId] = [t0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [users] AS [u] ON [s].[SubmittedBy] = [u].[Id]
    WHERE [s].[Id] = @__submissionId_0
) AS [t1]
LEFT JOIN [reviewer_assignments] AS [r] ON [t1].[Id] = [r].[SubmissionId]
ORDER BY [t1].[Id], [t1].[Id0], [t1].[Id1], [t1].[Id2]

    WHERE [s].[Id] = @__submissionId_0
) AS [t1]
LEFT JOIN [reviewer_assignments] AS [r] ON [t1].[Id] = [r].[SubmissionId]
ORDER BY [t1].[Id], [t1].[Id0], [t1].[Id1], [t1].[Id2]

[t].[Content], [t].[Context], [t].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [t].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy0], [t].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [t].[Description], [t].[DocumentUrl] AS [DocumentUrl0], [t].[EN_Title], [DeletedAt1], [t0].[Description] AS [Description0], [t0].[EN_Title] AS [EN_Title0], [t0].[IsActive] AS [IsActive1], [t0].[IsApproved], [t0].[IsLegacy], [t0].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt1], [t0].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy1], [t0].[MaxStudents], [t0].[Objectives] AS [Objectives0], [t0].[Problem] AS [Problem0], [t0].[SemesterId], [t0].[SupervisorId], [t0].[VN_title] AS [VN_title0], [u].[Id] AS [Id2], [u].[AccessFailedCount], [u].[ConcurrencyStamp], [u].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt2], [u].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt2], [u].[Email], [u].[EmailConfirmed], [u].[PhoneNumber], [u].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [u].[SecurityStamp], [u].[TwoFactorEnabled], [u].[UserName]
    FROM [submissions] AS [s]
    LEFT JOIN [topic_versions] AS [t] ON [s].[TopicVersionId] = [t].[Id]
    LEFT JOIN [topics] AS [t0] ON [t].[TopicId] = [t0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [users] AS [u] ON [s].[SubmittedBy] = [u].[Id]
    WHERE [s].[Id] = @__submissionId_0
) AS [t1]
LEFT JOIN [reviewer_assignments] AS [r] ON [t1].[Id] = [r].[SubmissionId]
ORDER BY [t1].[Id], [t1].[Id0], [t1].[Id1], [t1].[Id2]

FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [s].[Id], [s].[AdditionalNotes], [s].[AiCheckDetails], [s].[AiCheckScore], [s].[AiCheckStatus], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[CreatedBy], [s].[DeletedAt], [s].[DocumentUrl], [s].[IsActive], [s].[LastModifiedAt], [s].[LastModifiedBy], [s].[PhaseId], [s].[Status], [s].[SubmissionRound], [s].[SubmittedAt], [s].[SubmittedBy], [s].[TopicId], [s].[TopicVersionId], [t].[Id] AS [Id0], [t].[Content], [t].[Context], [t].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [t].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy0], [t].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [t].[Description], [t].[DocumentUrl] AS [DocumentUrl0], [t].[EN_Title], [t].[ExpectedOutcomes], [t].[IsActive] AS [IsActive0], [t].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [t].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [t].[Methodology], [t].[Objectives], [t].[Problem], [t].[Requirements], [t].[Status] AS [Status0], [t].[SubmittedAt] AS [SubmittedAt0], [t].[SubmittedBy] AS [SubmittedBy0], [t].[TopicId] AS [TopicId0], [t].[VN_title], [t].[VersionNumber], [t0].[Id] AS [Id1], [t0].[Abbreviation], [t0].[CategoryId], [t0].[Content] AS [Content0], [t0].[Context] AS [Context0], [t0].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt1], [t0].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy1], [t0].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt1], [t0].[Description] AS [Description0], [t0].[EN_Title] AS [EN_Title0], [t0].[IsActive] AS [IsActive1], [t0].[IsApproved], [t0].[IsLegacy], [t0].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt1], [t0].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy1], [t0].[MaxStudents], [t0].[Objectives] AS [Objectives0], [t0].[Problem] AS [Problem0], [t0].[SemesterId], [t0].[SupervisorId], [t0].[VN_title] AS [VN_title0], [u].[Id] AS [Id2], [u].[AccessFailedCount], [u].[ConcurrencyStamp], [u].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt2], [u].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt2], [u].[Email], [u].[EmailConfirmed], [u].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt2], [u].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy2], [u].[LockoutEnabled], [u].[LockoutEnd], [u].[NormalizedEmail], [u].[NormalizedUserName], [u].[PasswordHash], [u].[PhoneNumber], [u].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [u].[SecurityStamp], [u].[TwoFactorEnabled], [u].[UserName]
    FROM [submissions] AS [s]
    LEFT JOIN [topic_versions] AS [t] ON [s].[TopicVersionId] = [t].[Id]
    LEFT JOIN [topics] AS [t0] ON [t].[TopicId] = [t0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [users] AS [u] ON [s].[SubmittedBy] = [u].[Id]
    WHERE [s].[Id] = @__submissionId_0
) AS [t1]
LEFT JOIN [reviewer_assignments] AS [r] ON [t1].[Id] = [r].[SubmissionId]
ORDER BY [t1].[Id], [t1].[Id0], [t1].[Id1], [t1].[Id2]

FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [s].[Id], [s].[AdditionalNotes], [s].[AiCheckDetails], [s].[AiCheckScore], [s].[AiCheckStatus], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[CreatedBy], [s].[DeletedAt], [s].[DocumentUrl], [s].[IsActive], [s].[LastModifiedAt], [s].[LastModifiedBy], [s].[PhaseId], [s].[Status], [s].[SubmissionRound], [s].[SubmittedAt], [s].[SubmittedBy], [s].[TopicId], [s].[TopicVersionId], [t].[Id] AS [Id0], [t].[Content], [t].[Context], [t].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [t].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy0], [t].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [t].[Description], [t].[DocumentUrl] AS [DocumentUrl0], [t].[EN_Title], [t].[ExpectedOutcomes], [t].[IsActive] AS [IsActive0], [t].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [t].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [t].[Methodology], [t].[Objectives], [t].[Problem], [t].[Requirements], [t].[Status] AS [Status0], [t].[SubmittedAt] AS [SubmittedAt0], [t].[SubmittedBy] AS [SubmittedBy0], [t].[TopicId] AS [TopicId0], [t].[VN_title], [t].[VersionNumber], [t0].[Id] AS [Id1], [t0].[Abbreviation], [t0].[CategoryId], [t0].[Content] AS [Content0], [t0].[Context] AS [Context0], [t0].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt1], [t0].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy1], [t0].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt1], [t0].[Description] AS [Description0], [t0].[EN_Title] AS [EN_Title0], [t0].[IsActive] AS [IsActive1], [t0].[IsApproved], [t0].[IsLegacy], [t0].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt1], [t0].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy1], [t0].[MaxStudents], [t0].[Objectives] AS [Objectives0], [t0].[Problem] AS [Problem0], [t0].[SemesterId], [t0].[SupervisorId], [t0].[VN_title] AS [VN_title0], [u].[Id] AS [Id2], [u].[AccessFailedCount], [u].[ConcurrencyStamp], [u].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt2], [u].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt2], [u].[Email], [u].[EmailConfirmed], [u].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt2], [u].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy2], [u].[LockoutEnabled], [u].[LockoutEnd], [u].[NormalizedEmail], [u].[NormalizedUserName], [u].[PasswordHash], [u].[PhoneNumber], [u].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [u].[SecurityStamp], [u].[TwoFactorEnabled], [u].[UserName]
    FROM [submissions] AS [s]
    LEFT JOIN [topic_versions] AS [t] ON [s].[TopicVersionId] = [t].[Id]
    LEFT JOIN [topics] AS [t0] ON [t].[TopicId] = [t0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [users] AS [u] ON [s].[SubmittedBy] = [u].[Id]
    WHERE [s].[Id] = @__submissionId_0
) AS [t1]
LEFT JOIN [reviewer_assignments] AS [r] ON [t1].[Id] = [r].[SubmissionId]
ORDER BY [t1].[Id], [t1].[Id0], [t1].[Id1], [t1].[Id2]

[t].[Content], [t].[Context], [t].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [t].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy0], [t].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [t].[Description], [t].[DocumentUrl] AS [DocumentUrl0], [t].[EN_Title], [DeletedAt1], [t0].[Description] AS [Description0], [t0].[EN_Title] AS [EN_Title0], [t0].[IsActive] AS [IsActive1], [t0].[IsApproved], [t0].[IsLegacy], [t0].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt1], [t0].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy1], [t0].[MaxStudents], [t0].[Objectives] AS [Objectives0], [t0].[Problem] AS [Problem0], [t0].[SemesterId], [t0].[SupervisorId], [t0].[VN_title] AS [VN_title0], [u].[Id] AS [Id2], [u].[AccessFailedCount], [u].[ConcurrencyStamp], [u].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt2], [u].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt2], [u].[Email], [u].[EmailConfirmed], [u].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt2], [u].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy2], [u].[LockoutEnabled], [u].[LockoutEnd], [u].[NormalizedEmail], [u].[NormalizedUserName], [u].[PasswordHash], [u].[PhoneNumber], [u].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [u].[SecurityStamp], [u].[TwoFactorEnabled], [u].[UserName]
    FROM [submissions] AS [s]
    LEFT JOIN [topic_versions] AS [t] ON [s].[TopicVersionId] = [t].[Id]
    LEFT JOIN [topics] AS [t0] ON [t].[TopicId] = [t0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [users] AS [u] ON [s].[SubmittedBy] = [u].[Id]
    WHERE [s].[Id] = @__submissionId_0
) AS [t1]
LEFT JOIN [reviewer_assignments] AS [r] ON [t1].[Id] = [r].[SubmissionId]
ORDER BY [t1].[Id], [t1].[Id0], [t1].[Id1], [t1].[Id2]

FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [s].[Id], [s].[AdditionalNotes], [s].[AiCheckDetails], [s].[AiCheckScore], [s].[AiCheckStatus], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[CreatedBy], [s].[DeletedAt], [s].[DocumentUrl], [s].[IsActive], [t].[Content], [t].[Context], [t].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [t].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy0], [t].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [t].[Description], [t].[DocumentUrl] AS [DocumentUrl0], [t].[EN_Title], [t].[ExpectedOutcomes], [t].[IsActive] AS [IsActive0], [t].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [t].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [t].[Methodology], [t].[Objectives], [t].[Problem], [t].[Requirements], [t].[Status] AS [Status0], [t].[SubmittedAt] AS [SubmittedAt0], [t].[SubmittedBy] AS [SubmittedBy0], [t].[TopicId] AS [TopicId0], [t].[VN_title], [t].[VersionNumber], [t0].[Id] AS [Id1], [t0].[Abbreviation], [t0].[CategoryId], [t0].[Content] AS [Content0], [t0].[Context] AS [Context0], [t0].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt1], [t0].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy1], [t0].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt1], [t0].[Description] AS [Description0], [t0].[EN_Title] AS [EN_Title0], [t0].[IsActive] AS [IsActive1], [t0].[IsApproved], [t0].[IsLegacy], [t0].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt1], [t0].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy1], [t0].[MaxStudents], [t0].[Objectives] AS [Objectives0], [t0].[Problem] AS [Problem0], [t0].[SemesterId], [t0].[SupervisorId], [t0].[VN_title] AS [VN_title0], [u].[Id] AS [Id2], [u].[AccessFailedCount], [u].[ConcurrencyStamp], [u].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt2], [u].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt2], [u].[Email], [u].[EmailConfirmed], [u].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt2], [u].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy2], [u].[LockoutEnabled], [u].[LockoutEnd], [u].[NormalizedEmail], [u].[NormalizedUserName], [u].[PasswordHash], [u].[PhoneNumber], [u].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [u].[SecurityStamp], [u].[TwoFactorEnabled], [u].[UserName]
    FROM [submissions] AS [s]
    LEFT JOIN [topic_versions] AS [t] ON [s].[TopicVersionId] = [t].[Id]
    LEFT JOIN [topics] AS [t0] ON [t].[TopicId] = [t0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [users] AS [u] ON [s].[SubmittedBy] = [u].[Id]
    WHERE [s].[Id] = @__submissionId_0
) AS [t1]
LEFT JOIN [reviewer_assignments] AS [r] ON [t1].[Id] = [r].[SubmissionId]
ORDER BY [t1].[Id], [t1].[Id0], [t1].[Id1], [t1].[Id2]

            SELECT t1.Id, t1.AdditionalNotes, t1.AiCheckDetails, t1.AiCheckScore, t1.AiCheckStatus, t1.CreatedAt, t1.CreatedBy, t1.DeletedAt, t1.DocumentUrl, t1.IsActive, t1.LastModifiedAt, t1.DeletedAt0, t1.Description, t1.DocumentUrl0, t1.EN_Title, t1.ExpectedOutcomes, t1.IsActive0, t1.LastModifiedAt0, t1.LastModifiedBy0, t1.Methodology, t1.Objectives, t1.Problem, t1.Requirements, t1.Status0, t1.SubmittedAt0, t1.SubmittedBy0, t1.TopicId0, t1.VN_title, t1.VersionNumber, t1.Id1, t1.Abbreviation, t1.CategoryId, t1.Content0, t1.Context0, t1.CreatedAt1, t1.CreatedBy1, t1.DeletedAt1, t1.Description0, t1.EN_Title0, t1.IsActive1, t1.IsApproved, t1.IsLegacy, t1.LastModifiedAt1, t1.LastModifiedBy1, t1.MaxStudents, t1.Objectives0, t1.Problem0, t1.SemesterId, t1.SupervisorId, t1.VN_title0, t1.Id2, t1.AccessFailedCount, t1.ConcurrencyStamp, t1.CreatedAt2, t1.DeletedAt2, t1.Email, t1.EmailConfirmed, t1.LastModifiedAt2, t1.LastModifiedBy2, t1.LockoutEnabled, t1.LockoutEnd, t1.NormalizedEmail, t1.NormalizedUserName, t1.PasswordHash, t1.PhoneNumber, t1.PhoneNumberConfirmed, t1.SecurityStamp, t1.TwoFactorEnabled, t1.UserName, t2.Id, t2.AssignedAt, t2.AssignedBy, t2.AssignmentType, t2.CompletedAt, t2.Deadline, t2.ReviewerId, t2.SkillMatchScore, t2.StartedAt, t2.Status, t2.SubmissionId, t2.Id0, t2.Id1, t2.AssignmentId, t2.CreatedAt, t2.CreatedBy, t2.DeletedAt, t2.IsActive, t2.LastModifiedAt, t2.LastModifiedBy, t2.OverallComment, t2.OverallScore, t2.Recommendation, t2.Status0, t2.SubmittedAt, t2.TimeSpentMinutes, t2.AccessFailedCount, t2.ConcurrencyStamp, t2.CreatedAt0, t2.DeletedAt0, t2.Email, t2.EmailConfirmed, t2.LastModifiedAt0, t2.LastModifiedBy0, t2.LockoutEnabled, t2.LockoutEnd, t2.NormalizedEmail, t2.NormalizedUserName, t2.PasswordHash, t2.PhoneNumber, t2.PhoneNumberConfirmed, t2.SecurityStamp, t2.TwoFactorEnabled, t2.UserName
            FROM 
            (
                SELECT TOP(1) s.Id, s.AdditionalNotes, s.AiCheckDetails, s.AiCheckScore, s.AiCheckStatus, s.CreatedAt, s.CreatedBy, s.DeletedAt, s.DocumentUrl, s.IsActive, s.LastModifiedAt, s.LastModifiedBy, s.PhaseId, s.Status, s.SubmissionRound, s.SubmittedAt, s.SubmittedBy, s.TopicId, s.TopicVersionId, t.Id AS Id0, t.Content, t.Context, t.CreatedAt AS CreatedAt0, t.CreatedBy AS CreatedBy0, t.DeletedAt AS DeletedAt0, t.Description, t.DocumentUrl AS DocumentUrl0, t.EN_Title, t.ExpectedOutcomes, t.IsActive AS IsActive0, t.LastModifiedAt AS LastModifiedAt0, t.LastModifiedBy AS LastModifiedBy0, t.Methodology, t.Objectives, t.Problem, t.Requirements, t.Status AS Status0, t.SubmittedAt AS SubmittedAt0, t.SubmittedBy AS SubmittedBy0, t.TopicId AS TopicId0, t.VN_title, t.VersionNumber, t0.Id AS Id1, t0.Abbreviation, t0.CategoryId, t0.Content AS Content0, t0.Context AS Context0, t0.CreatedAt AS CreatedAt1, t0.CreatedBy AS CreatedBy1, t0.DeletedAt AS DeletedAt1, t0.Description AS Description0, t0.EN_Title AS EN_Title0, t0.IsActive AS IsActive1, t0.IsApproved, t0.IsLegacy, t0.LastModifiedAt AS LastModifiedAt1, t0.LastModifiedBy AS LastModifiedBy1, t0.MaxStudents, t0.Objectives AS Objectives0, t0.Problem AS Problem0, t0.SemesterId, t0.SupervisorId, t0.VN_title AS VN_title0, u.Id AS Id2, u.AccessFailedCount, u.ConcurrencyStamp, u.CreatedAt AS CreatedAt2, u.DeletedAt AS DeletedAt2, u.Email, u.EmailConfirmed, u.LastModifiedAt AS LastModifiedAt2, u.LastModifiedBy AS LastModifiedBy2, u.LockoutEnabled, u.LockoutEnd, u.NormalizedEmail, u.NormalizedUserName, u.PasswordHash, u.PhoneNumber, u.PhoneNumberConfirmed, u.SecurityStamp, u.TwoFactorEnabled, u.UserName
                FROM submissions AS s
                LEFT JOIN topic_versions AS t ON s.TopicVersionId == t.Id
                LEFT JOIN topics AS t0 ON t.TopicId == t0.Id
                INNER JOIN users AS u ON s.SubmittedBy == u.Id
                WHERE s.Id == @__submissionId_0
            ) AS t1
            LEFT JOIN 
            (
                SELECT r.Id, r.AssignedAt, r.AssignedBy, r.AssignmentType, r.CompletedAt, r.Deadline, r.ReviewerId, r.SkillMatchScore, r.StartedAt, r.Status, r.SubmissionId, u0.Id AS Id0, r0.Id AS Id1, r0.AssignmentId, r0.CreatedAt, r0.CreatedBy, r0.DeletedAt, r0.IsActive, r0.LastModifiedAt, r0.LastModifiedBy, r0.OverallComment, r0.OverallScore, r0.Recommendation, r0.Status AS Status0, r0.SubmittedAt, r0.TimeSpentMinutes, u0.AccessFailedCount, u0.ConcurrencyStamp, u0.CreatedAt AS CreatedAt0, u0.DeletedAt AS DeletedAt0, u0.Email, u0.EmailConfirmed, u0.LastModifiedAt AS LastModifiedAt0, u0.LastModifiedBy AS LastModifiedBy0, u0.LockoutEnabled, u0.LockoutEnd, u0.NormalizedEmail, u0.NormalizedUserName, u0.PasswordHash, u0.PhoneNumber, u0.PhoneNumberConfirmed, u0.SecurityStamp, u0.TwoFactorEnabled, u0.UserName
                FROM reviewer_assignments AS r
                INNER JOIN users AS u0 ON r.ReviewerId == u0.Id
                LEFT JOIN reviews AS r0 ON r.Id == r0.AssignmentId
            ) AS t2 ON t1.Id == t2.SubmissionId
            ORDER BY t1.Id ASC, t1.Id0 ASC, t1.Id1 ASC, t1.Id2 ASC, t2.Id ASC, t2.Id0 ASC), 
        null,

    LEFT JOIN [topic_versions] AS [t] ON [s].[TopicVersionId] = [t].[Id]
    LEFT JOIN [topics] AS [t0] ON [t].[TopicId] = [t0].[Id]

FROM [reviews] AS [r]
INNER JOIN [reviewer_assignments] AS [r0] ON [r].[AssignmentId] = [r0].[Id]
INNER JOIN [users] AS [u] ON [r0].[ReviewerId] = [u].[Id]
WHERE [r].[AssignmentId] IN (
    SELECT [s].[value]
    FROM OPENJSON(@__Select_0) WITH ([value] int '$') AS [s]

) AS [t1]

    LEFT JOIN [reviews] AS [r0] ON [r].[Id] = [r0].[AssignmentId]
) AS [t2] ON [t1].[Id] = [t2].[SubmissionId]

[DeletedAt1], [t0].[Description] AS [Description0], [t0].[EN_Title] AS [EN_Title0], [t0].[IsActive] AS [IsActive1], [t0].[IsApproved], [t0].[IsLegacy], [t0].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt1], [u].[PhoneNumber], [u].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [u].[SecurityStamp], [u].[TwoFactorEnabled], [u].[UserName]
    FROM [submissions] AS [s]
    LEFT JOIN [topic_versions] AS [t] ON [s].[TopicVersionId] = [t].[Id]
    LEFT JOIN [topics] AS [t0] ON [t].[TopicId] = [t0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [users] AS [u] ON [s].[SubmittedBy] = [u].[Id]
    WHERE [s].[Id] = @__submissionId_0
) AS [t1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [r].[Id], [r].[AssignedAt], [r].[AssignedBy], [r].[AssignmentType], [r].[CompletedAt], [r].[Deadline], [r].[ReviewerId], [r].[SkillMatchScore], [r].[StartedAt], [r].[Status], [r].[SubmissionId], [u0].[Id] AS [Id0], [r0].[Id] AS [Id1], [r0].[AssignmentId], [r0].[CreatedAt], [r0].[CreatedBy], [r0].[DeletedAt], [r0].[IsActive], [r0].[LastModifiedAt], [r0].[LastModifiedBy], [r0].[OverallComment], [r0].[OverallScore], [r0].[Recommendation], [r0].[Status] AS [Status0], [r0].[SubmittedAt], [r0].[TimeSpentMinutes], [u0].[AccessFailedCount], [u0].[ConcurrencyStamp], [u0].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [u0].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [u0].[Email], [u0].[EmailConfirmed], [u0].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [u0].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [u0].[LockoutEnabled], [u0].[LockoutEnd], [u0].[NormalizedEmail], [u0].[NormalizedUserName], [u0].[PasswordHash], [u0].[PhoneNumber], [u0].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [u0].[SecurityStamp], [u0].[TwoFactorEnabled], [u0].[UserName]
    FROM [reviewer_assignments] AS [r]
    INNER JOIN [users] AS [u0] ON [r].[ReviewerId] = [u0].[Id]
    LEFT JOIN [reviews] AS [r0] ON [r].[Id] = [r0].[AssignmentId]
) AS [t2] ON [t1].[Id] = [t2].[SubmissionId]
ORDER BY [t1].[Id], [t1].[Id0], [t1].[Id1], [t1].[Id2], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Id0]

    LEFT JOIN [topic_versions] AS [t] ON [s].[TopicVersionId] = [t].[Id]
    LEFT JOIN [topics] AS [t0] ON [t].[TopicId] = [t0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [users] AS [u] ON [s].[SubmittedBy] = [u].[Id]
    WHERE [s].[Id] = @__submissionId_0
) AS [t1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [r].[Id], [r].[AssignedAt], [r].[AssignedBy], [r].[AssignmentType], [r].[CompletedAt], [r].[Deadline], [r].[ReviewerId], [r].[SkillMatchScore], [r].[StartedAt], [r].[Status], [r].[SubmissionId], [u0].[Id] AS [Id0], [r0].[Id] AS [Id1], [r0].[AssignmentId], [r0].[CreatedAt], [r0].[CreatedBy], [r0].[DeletedAt], [r0].[IsActive], [r0].[LastModifiedAt], [r0].[LastModifiedBy], [r0].[OverallComment], [r0].[OverallScore], [r0].[Recommendation], [r0].[Status] AS [Status0], [r0].[SubmittedAt], [r0].[TimeSpentMinutes], [u0].[AccessFailedCount], [u0].[ConcurrencyStamp], [u0].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [u0].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [u0].[Email], [u0].[EmailConfirmed], [u0].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [u0].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [u0].[LockoutEnabled], [u0].[LockoutEnd], [u0].[NormalizedEmail], [u0].[NormalizedUserName], [u0].[PasswordHash], [u0].[PhoneNumber], [u0].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [u0].[SecurityStamp], [u0].[TwoFactorEnabled], [u0].[UserName]
    FROM [reviewer_assignments] AS [r]
    INNER JOIN [users] AS [u0] ON [r].[ReviewerId] = [u0].[Id]
    LEFT JOIN [reviews] AS [r0] ON [r].[Id] = [r0].[AssignmentId]
) AS [t2] ON [t1].[Id] = [t2].[SubmissionId]
ORDER BY [t1].[Id], [t1].[Id0], [t1].[Id1], [t1].[Id2], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Id0]

[Id1], [t0].[Abbreviation], [t0].[CategoryId], [t0].[Content] AS [Content0], [t0].[Context] AS [Context0], [t0].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt1], [t0].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy1], [t0].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt1], [t0].[Description] AS [Description0], [t0].[EN_Title] AS [EN_Title0], [t0].[IsActive] AS [IsActive1], [t0].[IsApproved], [t0].[IsLegacy], [t0].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt1], [t0].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy1], [t0].[MaxStudents], [t0].[Objectives] AS [Objectives0], [t0].[Problem] AS [Problem0], [t0].[SemesterId], [t0].[SupervisorId], [t0].[VN_title] AS [VN_title0], [u].[Id] AS [Id2], [u].[AccessFailedCount], [u].[ConcurrencyStamp], [u].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt2], [u].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt2], [u].[Email], [u].[EmailConfirmed], [u].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt2], [u].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy2], [u].[LockoutEnabled], [u].[LockoutEnd], [u].[NormalizedEmail], [u].[NormalizedUserName], [u].[PasswordHash], [u].[PhoneNumber], [u].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [u].[SecurityStamp], [u].[TwoFactorEnabled], [u].[UserName]
    FROM [submissions] AS [s]
    LEFT JOIN [topic_versions] AS [t] ON [s].[TopicVersionId] = [t].[Id]
    LEFT JOIN [topics] AS [t0] ON [t].[TopicId] = [t0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [users] AS [u] ON [s].[SubmittedBy] = [u].[Id]
    WHERE [s].[Id] = @__submissionId_0
) AS [t1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [r].[Id], [r].[AssignedAt], [r].[AssignedBy], [r].[AssignmentType], [r].[CompletedAt], [r].[Deadline], [r].[ReviewerId], [r].[SkillMatchScore], [r].[StartedAt], [r].[Status], [r].[SubmissionId], [u0].[Id] AS [Id0], [r0].[Id] AS [Id1], [r0].[AssignmentId], [r0].[CreatedAt], [r0].[CreatedBy], [r0].[DeletedAt], [r0].[IsActive], [r0].[LastModifiedAt], [r0].[LastModifiedBy], [r0].[OverallComment], [r0].[OverallScore], [r0].[Recommendation], [r0].[Status] AS [Status0], [r0].[SubmittedAt], [r0].[TimeSpentMinutes], [u0].[AccessFailedCount], [u0].[ConcurrencyStamp], [u0].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [u0].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [u0].[Email], [u0].[EmailConfirmed], [u0].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [u0].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [u0].[LockoutEnabled], [u0].[LockoutEnd], [u0].[NormalizedEmail], [u0].[NormalizedUserName], [u0].[PasswordHash], [u0].[PhoneNumber], [u0].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [u0].[SecurityStamp], [u0].[TwoFactorEnabled], [u0].[UserName]
    FROM [reviewer_assignments] AS [r]
    INNER JOIN [users] AS [u0] ON [r].[ReviewerId] = [u0].[Id]
    LEFT JOIN [reviews] AS [r0] ON [r].[Id] = [r0].[AssignmentId]
) AS [t2] ON [t1].[Id] = [t2].[SubmissionId]
ORDER BY [t1].[Id], [t1].[Id0], [t1].[Id1], [t1].[Id2], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Id0]

[t2].[TimeSpentMinutes], [t2].[AccessFailedCount], [t2].[ConcurrencyStamp], [t2].[CreatedAt0], [t2].[DeletedAt0], [t2].[Email], [t2].[EmailConfirmed], [t2].[LastModifiedAt0], [t2].[LastModifiedBy0], [t2].[TwoFactorEnabled], [t2].[UserName]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [s].[Id], [s].[AdditionalNotes], [s].[AiCheckDetails], [s].[AiCheckScore], [s].[AiCheckStatus], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[CreatedBy], [s].[DeletedAt], [s].[DocumentUrl], [s].[IsActive], [s].[LastModifiedAt], [s].[LastModifiedBy], [s].[PhaseId], [s].[Status], [s].[SubmissionRound], [s].[SubmittedAt], [s].[SubmittedBy], [s].[TopicId], [s].[TopicVersionId], [t].[Id] AS [Id0], [t].[Content], [t].[Context], [t].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [t].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy0], [t].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [t].[Description], [t].[DocumentUrl] AS [DocumentUrl0], [t].[EN_Title], [t].[ExpectedOutcomes], [t].[IsActive] AS [IsActive0], [t].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [t].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [t].[Methodology], [t].[Objectives], [t].[Problem], [t].[Requirements], [t].[Status] AS [Status0], [t].[SubmittedAt] AS [SubmittedAt0], [t].[SubmittedBy] AS [SubmittedBy0], [t].[TopicId] AS [TopicId0], [t].[VN_title], [t].[VersionNumber], [t0].[Id] AS [Id1], [t0].[Abbreviation], [t0].[CategoryId], [t0].[Content] AS [Content0], [t0].[Context] AS [Context0], [t0].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt1], [t0].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy1], [t0].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt1], [t0].[Description] AS [Description0], [t0].[EN_Title] AS [EN_Title0], [t0].[IsActive] AS [IsActive1], [t0].[IsApproved], [t0].[IsLegacy], [t0].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt1], [t0].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy1], [t0].[MaxStudents], [t0].[Objectives] AS [Objectives0], [t0].[Problem] AS [Problem0], [t0].[SemesterId], [t0].[SupervisorId], [t0].[VN_title] AS [VN_title0], [u].[Id] AS [Id2], [u].[AccessFailedCount], [u].[ConcurrencyStamp], [u].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt2], [u].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt2], [u].[Email], [u].[EmailConfirmed], [u].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt2], [u].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy2], [u].[LockoutEnabled], [u].[LockoutEnd], [u].[NormalizedEmail], [u].[NormalizedUserName], [u].[PasswordHash], [u].[PhoneNumber], [u].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [u].[SecurityStamp], [u].[TwoFactorEnabled], [u].[UserName]
    FROM [submissions] AS [s]
    LEFT JOIN [topic_versions] AS [t] ON [s].[TopicVersionId] = [t].[Id]
    LEFT JOIN [topics] AS [t0] ON [t].[TopicId] = [t0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [users] AS [u] ON [s].[SubmittedBy] = [u].[Id]
    WHERE [s].[Id] = @__submissionId_0
) AS [t1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [r].[Id], [r].[AssignedAt], [r].[AssignedBy], [r].[AssignmentType], [r].[CompletedAt], [r].[Deadline], [r].[ReviewerId], [r].[SkillMatchScore], [r].[StartedAt], [r].[Status], [r].[SubmissionId], [u0].[Id] AS [Id0], [r0].[Id] AS [Id1], [r0].[AssignmentId], [r0].[CreatedAt], [r0].[CreatedBy], [r0].[DeletedAt], [r0].[IsActive], [r0].[LastModifiedAt], [r0].[LastModifiedBy], [r0].[OverallComment], [r0].[OverallScore], [r0].[Recommendation], [r0].[Status] AS [Status0], [r0].[SubmittedAt], [r0].[TimeSpentMinutes], [u0].[AccessFailedCount], [u0].[ConcurrencyStamp], [u0].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [u0].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [u0].[Email], [u0].[EmailConfirmed], [u0].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [u0].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [u0].[LockoutEnabled], [u0].[LockoutEnd], [u0].[NormalizedEmail], [u0].[NormalizedUserName], [u0].[PasswordHash], [u0].[PhoneNumber], [u0].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [u0].[SecurityStamp], [u0].[TwoFactorEnabled], [u0].[UserName]
    FROM [reviewer_assignments] AS [r]
    INNER JOIN [users] AS [u0] ON [r].[ReviewerId] = [u0].[Id]
    LEFT JOIN [reviews] AS [r0] ON [r].[Id] = [r0].[AssignmentId]
) AS [t2] ON [t1].[Id] = [t2].[SubmissionId]
ORDER BY [t1].[Id], [t1].[Id0], [t1].[Id1], [t1].[Id2], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Id0]

[t2].[DeletedAt], [t2].[IsActive], [t2].[LastModifiedAt], [t2].[LastModifiedBy], [t2].[OverallComment], [t2].[OverallScore], [t2].[Recommendation], [t2].[Status0], [t2].[SubmittedAt], [t2].[TimeSpentMinutes], [t2].[AccessFailedCount], [t2].[ConcurrencyStamp], [t2].[CreatedAt0], [t2].[DeletedAt0], [t2].[Email], [t2].[EmailConfirmed], [t2].[LastModifiedAt0], [t2].[LastModifiedBy0], [t2].[LockoutEnabled], [t2].[LockoutEnd], [t2].[NormalizedEmail], [t2].[NormalizedUserName], [t2].[PasswordHash], [t2].[PhoneNumber], [t2].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [t2].[SecurityStamp], [t2].[TwoFactorEnabled], [t2].[UserName]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [s].[Id], [s].[AdditionalNotes], [s].[AiCheckDetails], [s].[AiCheckScore], [s].[AiCheckStatus], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[CreatedBy], [s].[DeletedAt], [s].[DocumentUrl], [s].[IsActive], [s].[LastModifiedAt], [s].[LastModifiedBy], [s].[PhaseId], [s].[Status], [s].[SubmissionRound], [s].[SubmittedAt], [s].[SubmittedBy], [s].[TopicId], [s].[TopicVersionId], [t].[Id] AS [Id0], [t].[Content], [t].[Context], [t].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [t].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy0], [t].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [t].[Description], [t].[DocumentUrl] AS [DocumentUrl0], [t].[EN_Title], [t].[ExpectedOutcomes], [t].[IsActive] AS [IsActive0], [t].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [t].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [t].[Methodology], [t].[Objectives], [t].[Problem], [t].[Requirements], [t].[Status] AS [Status0], [t].[SubmittedAt] AS [SubmittedAt0], [t].[SubmittedBy] AS [SubmittedBy0], [t].[TopicId] AS [TopicId0], [t].[VN_title], [t].[VersionNumber], [t0].[Id] AS [Id1], [t0].[Abbreviation], [t0].[CategoryId], [t0].[Content] AS [Content0], [t0].[Context] AS [Context0], [t0].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt1], [t0].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy1], [t0].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt1], [t0].[Description] AS [Description0], [t0].[EN_Title] AS [EN_Title0], [t0].[IsActive] AS [IsActive1], [t0].[IsApproved], [t0].[IsLegacy], [t0].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt1], [t0].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy1], [t0].[MaxStudents], [t0].[Objectives] AS [Objectives0], [t0].[Problem] AS [Problem0], [t0].[SemesterId], [t0].[SupervisorId], [t0].[VN_title] AS [VN_title0], [u].[Id] AS [Id2], [u].[AccessFailedCount], [u].[ConcurrencyStamp], [u].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt2], [u].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt2], [u].[Email], [u].[EmailConfirmed], [u].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt2], [u].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy2], [u].[LockoutEnabled], [u].[LockoutEnd], [u].[NormalizedEmail], [u].[NormalizedUserName], [u].[PasswordHash], [u].[PhoneNumber], [u].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [u].[SecurityStamp], [u].[TwoFactorEnabled], [u].[UserName]
    FROM [submissions] AS [s]
    LEFT JOIN [topic_versions] AS [t] ON [s].[TopicVersionId] = [t].[Id]
    LEFT JOIN [topics] AS [t0] ON [t].[TopicId] = [t0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [users] AS [u] ON [s].[SubmittedBy] = [u].[Id]
    WHERE [s].[Id] = @__submissionId_0
) AS [t1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [r].[Id], [r].[AssignedAt], [r].[AssignedBy], [r].[AssignmentType], [r].[CompletedAt], [r].[Deadline], [r].[ReviewerId], [r].[SkillMatchScore], [r].[StartedAt], [r].[Status], [r].[SubmissionId], [u0].[Id] AS [Id0], [r0].[Id] AS [Id1], [r0].[AssignmentId], [r0].[CreatedAt], [r0].[CreatedBy], [r0].[DeletedAt], [r0].[IsActive], [r0].[LastModifiedAt], [r0].[LastModifiedBy], [r0].[OverallComment], [r0].[OverallScore], [r0].[Recommendation], [r0].[Status] AS [Status0], [r0].[SubmittedAt], [r0].[TimeSpentMinutes], [u0].[AccessFailedCount], [u0].[ConcurrencyStamp], [u0].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [u0].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [u0].[Email], [u0].[EmailConfirmed], [u0].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [u0].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [u0].[LockoutEnabled], [u0].[LockoutEnd], [u0].[NormalizedEmail], [u0].[NormalizedUserName], [u0].[PasswordHash], [u0].[PhoneNumber], [u0].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [u0].[SecurityStamp], [u0].[TwoFactorEnabled], [u0].[UserName]
    FROM [reviewer_assignments] AS [r]
    INNER JOIN [users] AS [u0] ON [r].[ReviewerId] = [u0].[Id]
    LEFT JOIN [reviews] AS [r0] ON [r].[Id] = [r0].[AssignmentId]
) AS [t2] ON [t1].[Id] = [t2].[SubmissionId]
ORDER BY [t1].[Id], [t1].[Id0], [t1].[Id1], [t1].[Id2], [t2].[Id], [t2].[Id0]

FROM [reviews] AS [r]

INNER JOIN [users] AS [u] ON [r0].[ReviewerId] = [u].[Id]
WHERE [r].[AssignmentId] IN (

    FROM OPENJSON(@__Select_0) WITH ([value] int '$') AS [s]
) AND [r].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit)

    FROM [submissions] AS [s]
    LEFT JOIN [topic_versions] AS [t] ON [s].[TopicVersionId] = [t].[Id]
    LEFT JOIN [topics] AS [t0] ON [t].[TopicId] = [t0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [users] AS [u] ON [s].[SubmittedBy] = [u].[Id]
    WHERE [s].[Id] = @__submissionId_0
) AS [t1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [r].[Id], [r].[AssignedAt], [r].[AssignedBy], [r].[AssignmentType], [r].[CompletedAt], [r].[Deadline], [r].[ReviewerId], [r].[SkillMatchScore], [r].[StartedAt], [r].[Status], [r].[SubmissionId], [u0].[Id] AS [Id0], [r0].[Id] AS [Id1], [r0].[AssignmentId], [r0].[CreatedAt], [r0].[CreatedBy], [r0].[DeletedAt], [r0].[IsActive], [r0].[LastModifiedAt], [r0].[LastModifiedBy], [r0].[OverallComment], [r0].[OverallScore], [r0].[Recommendation], [r0].[Status] AS [Status0], [r0].[SubmittedAt], [r0].[TimeSpentMinutes], [u0].[AccessFailedCount], [u0].[ConcurrencyStamp], [u0].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [u0].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [u0].[Email], [u0].[EmailConfirmed], [u0].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [u0].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [u0].[LockoutEnabled], [u0].[LockoutEnd], [u0].[NormalizedEmail], [u0].[NormalizedUserName], [u0].[PasswordHash], [u0].[PhoneNumber], [u0].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [u0].[SecurityStamp], [u0].[TwoFactorEnabled], [u0].[UserName]

) AS [t2] ON [t1].[Id] = [t2].[SubmissionId]

        FROM reviews AS r
        INNER JOIN reviewer_assignments AS r0 ON r.AssignmentId == r0.Id
        INNER JOIN users AS u ON r0.ReviewerId == u.Id
        WHERE r.AssignmentId IN (
            SELECT s.value
            FROM OPENJSON(@__Select_0) WITH (value int '') AS s) && r.IsActive),

                WHERE s.Id == @__submissionId_0

                INNER JOIN users AS u0 ON r.ReviewerId == u0.Id
                LEFT JOIN reviews AS r0 ON r.Id == r0.AssignmentId
            ) AS t1 ON t0.Id == t1.SubmissionId
            ORDER BY t0.Id ASC, t0.Id0 ASC, t0.Id1 ASC, t1.Id ASC, t1.Id0 ASC),

    FROM [submissions] AS [s]
    LEFT JOIN [topics] AS [t] ON [s].[TopicId] = [t].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [users] AS [u] ON [s].[SubmittedBy] = [u].[Id]
    WHERE [s].[Id] = @__submissionId_0
) AS [t0]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [r].[Id], [r].[AssignedAt], [r].[AssignedBy], [r].[AssignmentType], [r].[CompletedAt], [r].[Deadline], [r].[ReviewerId], [r].[SkillMatchScore], [r].[StartedAt], [r].[Status], [r].[SubmissionId], [u0].[Id] AS [Id0], [r0].[Id] AS [Id1], [r0].[AssignmentId], [r0].[CreatedAt], [r0].[CreatedBy], [r0].[DeletedAt], [r0].[IsActive], [r0].[LastModifiedAt], [r0].[LastModifiedBy], [r0].[OverallComment], [r0].[OverallScore], [r0].[Recommendation], [r0].[Status] AS [Status0], [r0].[SubmittedAt], [r0].[TimeSpentMinutes], [u0].[AccessFailedCount], [u0].[ConcurrencyStamp], [u0].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [u0].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [u0].[Email], [u0].[EmailConfirmed], [u0].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [u0].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [u0].[LockoutEnabled], [u0].[LockoutEnd], [u0].[NormalizedEmail], [u0].[NormalizedUserName], [u0].[PasswordHash], [u0].[PhoneNumber], [u0].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [u0].[SecurityStamp], [u0].[TwoFactorEnabled], [u0].[UserName]
    FROM [reviewer_assignments] AS [r]
    INNER JOIN [users] AS [u0] ON [r].[ReviewerId] = [u0].[Id]
    LEFT JOIN [reviews] AS [r0] ON [r].[Id] = [r0].[AssignmentId]
) AS [t1] ON [t0].[Id] = [t1].[SubmissionId]
ORDER BY [t0].[Id], [t0].[Id0], [t0].[Id1], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Id0]

[t1].[StartedAt], [t1].[Status], [t1].[SubmissionId], [t1].[Id0], [t1].[Id1], [t1].[AssignmentId], [t1].[CreatedAt], [t1].[CreatedBy], [t1].[DeletedAt], [t1].[IsActive], [t1].[LastModifiedAt], FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [s].[Id], [s].[AdditionalNotes], [s].[AiCheckDetails], [s].[AiCheckScore], [s].[AiCheckStatus], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[CreatedBy], [s].[DeletedAt], [s].[DocumentUrl], [s].[IsActive], [s].[LastModifiedAt], [s].[LastModifiedBy], [s].[PhaseId], [s].[Status], [s].[SubmissionRound], [s].[SubmittedAt], [s].[SubmittedBy], [s].[TopicId], [s].[TopicVersionId], [t].[Id] AS [Id0], [t].[Abbreviation], [t].[CategoryId], [t].[Content], [t].[Context], [t].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [t].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy0], [t].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [t].[Description], [t].[EN_Title], [t].[IsActive] AS [IsActive0], [t].[IsApproved], [t].[IsLegacy], [t].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [t].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [t].[MaxStudents], [t].[Objectives], [t].[Problem], [t].[SemesterId], [t].[SupervisorId], [t].[VN_title], [u].[Id] AS [Id1], [u].[AccessFailedCount], [u].[ConcurrencyStamp], [u].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt1], [u].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt1], [u].[Email], [u].[EmailConfirmed], [u].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt1], [u].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy1], [u].[LockoutEnabled], [u].[LockoutEnd], [u].[NormalizedEmail], [u].[NormalizedUserName], [u].[PasswordHash], [u].[PhoneNumber], [u].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [u].[SecurityStamp], [u].[TwoFactorEnabled], [u].[UserName]
    FROM [submissions] AS [s]
    LEFT JOIN [topics] AS [t] ON [s].[TopicId] = [t].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [users] AS [u] ON [s].[SubmittedBy] = [u].[Id]
    WHERE [s].[Id] = @__submissionId_0
) AS [t0]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [r].[Id], [r].[AssignedAt], [r].[AssignedBy], [r].[AssignmentType], [r].[CompletedAt], [r].[Deadline], [r].[ReviewerId], [r].[SkillMatchScore], [r].[StartedAt], [r].[Status], [r].[SubmissionId], [u0].[Id] AS [Id0], [r0].[Id] AS [Id1], [r0].[AssignmentId], [r0].[CreatedAt], [r0].[CreatedBy], [r0].[DeletedAt], [r0].[IsActive], [r0].[LastModifiedAt], [r0].[LastModifiedBy], [r0].[OverallComment], [r0].[OverallScore], [r0].[Recommendation], [r0].[Status] AS [Status0], [r0].[SubmittedAt], [r0].[TimeSpentMinutes], [u0].[AccessFailedCount], [u0].[ConcurrencyStamp], [u0].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [u0].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [u0].[Email], [u0].[EmailConfirmed], [u0].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [u0].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [u0].[LockoutEnabled], [u0].[LockoutEnd], [u0].[NormalizedEmail], [u0].[NormalizedUserName], [u0].[PasswordHash], [u0].[PhoneNumber], [u0].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [u0].[SecurityStamp], [u0].[TwoFactorEnabled], [u0].[UserName]
    FROM [reviewer_assignments] AS [r]
    INNER JOIN [users] AS [u0] ON [r].[ReviewerId] = [u0].[Id]
    LEFT JOIN [reviews] AS [r0] ON [r].[Id] = [r0].[AssignmentId]
) AS [t1] ON [t0].[Id] = [t1].[SubmissionId]
ORDER BY [t0].[Id], [t0].[Id0], [t0].[Id1], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Id0]

    FROM [submissions] AS [s]
    LEFT JOIN [topics] AS [t] ON [s].[TopicId] = [t].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [users] AS [u] ON [s].[SubmittedBy] = [u].[Id]
    WHERE [s].[Id] = @__submissionId_0
) AS [t0]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [r].[Id], [r].[AssignedAt], [r].[AssignedBy], [r].[AssignmentType], [r].[CompletedAt], [r].[Deadline], [r].[ReviewerId], [r].[SkillMatchScore], [r].[StartedAt], [r].[Status], [r].[SubmissionId], [u0].[Id] AS [Id0], [r0].[Id] AS [Id1], [r0].[AssignmentId], [r0].[CreatedAt], [r0].[CreatedBy], [r0].[DeletedAt], [r0].[IsActive], [r0].[LastModifiedAt], [r0].[LastModifiedBy], [r0].[OverallComment], [r0].[OverallScore], [r0].[Recommendation], [r0].[Status] AS [Status0], [r0].[SubmittedAt], [r0].[TimeSpentMinutes], [u0].[AccessFailedCount], [u0].[ConcurrencyStamp], [u0].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [u0].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [u0].[Email], [u0].[EmailConfirmed], [u0].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [u0].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [u0].[LockoutEnabled], [u0].[LockoutEnd], [u0].[NormalizedEmail], [u0].[NormalizedUserName], [u0].[PasswordHash], [u0].[PhoneNumber], [u0].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [u0].[SecurityStamp], [u0].[TwoFactorEnabled], [u0].[UserName]
    FROM [reviewer_assignments] AS [r]
    INNER JOIN [users] AS [u0] ON [r].[ReviewerId] = [u0].[Id]
    LEFT JOIN [reviews] AS [r0] ON [r].[Id] = [r0].[AssignmentId]
) AS [t1] ON [t0].[Id] = [t1].[SubmissionId]

    SELECT [r].[Id], [r].[AssignedAt], [r].[AssignedBy], [r].[AssignmentType], [r].[CompletedAt], [r].[Deadline], [r].[ReviewerId], [r].[SkillMatchScore], [r].[StartedAt], [r].[Status], [r].[SubmissionId], [u0].[Id] AS [Id0], [r0].[Id] AS [Id1], [r0].[AssignmentId], [r0].[CreatedAt], [r0].[CreatedBy], [r0].[DeletedAt], [r0].[IsActive], [r0].[LastModifiedAt], [r0].[LastModifiedBy], [r0].[OverallComment], [r0].[OverallScore], [r0].[Recommendation], [r0].[Status] AS [Status0], [r0].[SubmittedAt], [r0].[TimeSpentMinutes], [u0].[AccessFailedCount], [u0].[ConcurrencyStamp], [u0].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [u0].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [u0].[Email], [u0].[EmailConfirmed], [u0].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [u0].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [u0].[LockoutEnabled], [u0].[LockoutEnd], [u0].[NormalizedEmail], [u0].[NormalizedUserName], [u0].[PasswordHash], [u0].[PhoneNumber], [u0].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [u0].[SecurityStamp], [u0].[TwoFactorEnabled], [u0].[UserName]
    FROM [reviewer_assignments] AS [r]
    INNER JOIN [users] AS [u0] ON [r].[ReviewerId] = [u0].[Id]
    LEFT JOIN [reviews] AS [r0] ON [r].[Id] = [r0].[AssignmentId]
) AS [t1] ON [t0].[Id] = [t1].[SubmissionId]
ORDER BY [t0].[Id], [t0].[Id0], [t0].[Id1], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Id0]

[t1].[NormalizedEmail], [t1].[NormalizedUserName], [t1].[PasswordHash], [t1].[PhoneNumber], [t1].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [t1].[SecurityStamp], [t1].[TwoFactorEnabled], [t1].[UserName]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [s].[Id], [s].[AdditionalNotes], [s].[AiCheckDetails], [s].[AiCheckScore], [s].[AiCheckStatus], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[CreatedBy], [s].[DeletedAt], [s].[DocumentUrl], [s].[IsActive], [s].[LastModifiedAt], [s].[LastModifiedBy], [s].[PhaseId], [s].[Status], [s].[SubmissionRound], [s].[SubmittedAt], [s].[SubmittedBy], [s].[TopicId], [s].[TopicVersionId], [t].[Id] AS [Id0], [t].[Abbreviation], [t].[CategoryId], [t].[Content], [t].[Context], [t].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [t].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy0], [t].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [t].[Description], [t].[EN_Title], [t].[IsActive] AS [IsActive0], [t].[IsApproved], [t].[IsLegacy], [t].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [t].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [t].[MaxStudents], [t].[Objectives], [t].[Problem], [t].[SemesterId], [t].[SupervisorId], [t].[VN_title], [u].[Id] AS [Id1], [u].[AccessFailedCount], [u].[ConcurrencyStamp], [u].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt1], [u].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt1], [u].[Email], [u].[EmailConfirmed], [u].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt1], [u].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy1], [u].[LockoutEnabled], [u].[LockoutEnd], [u].[NormalizedEmail], [u].[NormalizedUserName], [u].[PasswordHash], [u].[PhoneNumber], [u].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [u].[SecurityStamp], [u].[TwoFactorEnabled], [u].[UserName]
    FROM [submissions] AS [s]
    LEFT JOIN [topics] AS [t] ON [s].[TopicId] = [t].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [users] AS [u] ON [s].[SubmittedBy] = [u].[Id]
    WHERE [s].[Id] = @__submissionId_0
) AS [t0]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [r].[Id], [r].[AssignedAt], [r].[AssignedBy], [r].[AssignmentType], [r].[CompletedAt], [r].[Deadline], [r].[ReviewerId], [r].[SkillMatchScore], [r].[StartedAt], [r].[Status], [r].[SubmissionId], [u0].[Id] AS [Id0], [r0].[Id] AS [Id1], [r0].[AssignmentId], [r0].[CreatedAt], [r0].[CreatedBy], [r0].[DeletedAt], [r0].[IsActive], [r0].[LastModifiedAt], [r0].[LastModifiedBy], [r0].[OverallComment], [r0].[OverallScore], [r0].[Recommendation], [r0].[Status] AS [Status0], [r0].[SubmittedAt], [r0].[TimeSpentMinutes], [u0].[AccessFailedCount], [u0].[ConcurrencyStamp], [u0].[CreatedAt] AS [CreatedAt0], [u0].[DeletedAt] AS [DeletedAt0], [u0].[Email], [u0].[EmailConfirmed], [u0].[LastModifiedAt] AS [LastModifiedAt0], [u0].[LastModifiedBy] AS [LastModifiedBy0], [u0].[LockoutEnabled], [u0].[LockoutEnd], [u0].[NormalizedEmail], [u0].[NormalizedUserName], [u0].[PasswordHash], [u0].[PhoneNumber], [u0].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [u0].[SecurityStamp], [u0].[TwoFactorEnabled], [u0].[UserName]
    FROM [reviewer_assignments] AS [r]

    LEFT JOIN [reviews] AS [r0] ON [r].[Id] = [r0].[AssignmentId]
) AS [t1] ON [t0].[Id] = [t1].[SubmissionId]
